attributes.action: Not to waste billions of public money upon Trident, and instead fund environmentally friendly homes for the general public.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Instead of spending and wasting huge amounts of public money upon an idea which will never actually be put to use. The money could be spent upon environmentally sound 'upgrades' for many homes. Thus, decreasing energy consumption from power plants and damaging the environment far less.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
